---
id: copy-file-as
title: "Copy a file"
description: "Copies (and converts if possible) an existing file to the specified folder."

---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Copy a file"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/file/{fileId}/copyas"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Copies (and converts if possible) an existing file to the specified folder.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"fileId","in":"path","description":"The file ID to copy.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":9846}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The parameters for copying a file.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["destFolderId","destTitle"],"type":"object","properties":{"destTitle":{"type":"string","description":"The copied file name.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"destFolderId":{"oneOf":[{"type":"integer","example":1234},{"type":"string","example":"some text"}],"description":"The destination folder ID of the copied file."},"enableExternalExt":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether to allow creating the copied file of an external extension or not.","example":true},"password":{"type":"string","description":"The copied file password.","nullable":true,"example":"vfmf2vO1Kp"},"toForm":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether to convert the file to form or not.","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The parameters for copying a file.","title":"CopyAsJsonElement"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
